description: A delicious roll filled with mushrooms and spices.

description: A unique roll made with multigrain bread and spicy filling.

description: A crunchy multigrain roll stuffed with creamy cheesy coleslaw.

description: A calming green tea rich in antioxidants.

name: Ginger Tea Kettle
description: Classic ginger tea served in a kettle, perfect for sharing.

name: Niloufer Special Coffee
description: A rich and smooth signature coffee blend for a classic experience.

name: Chilli Paneer
description: Paneer cubes tossed with spicy chili sauce and vegetables.

name: Tofu in Hunan Sauce
description: Crispy tofu cubes tossed in spicy Hunan sauce.

name: SPL Black Tea
description: A robust and aromatic black tea to awaken your senses.
health_benefits: Rich in antioxidants and helps with alertness.

name: Lemon Tea
description: Refreshing black tea with a tangy lemon flavor.

name: Lemon Tea with Honey
description: Zesty lemon tea sweetened naturally with honey.
health_benefits: Rich in antioxidants and natural sweetness.

name: Niloufer Special Coffee
description: A rich and aromatic South Indian filter coffee, brewed with a blend of premium coffee beans and chicory, served frothy and hot in a traditional davara-tumbler. Known for its strong flavor and creamy texture, it's a beloved beverage at Cafe Niloufer.
health_benefits: Boosts metabolism, contains antioxidants, and improves mental alertness. Moderate caffeine content provides a quick energy lift.

name: Apple Blossom
description: A flaky, golden puff pastry filled with spiced apple compote, cinnamon, and a hint of citrus zest. Baked to perfection, it's served warm with a dusting of powdered sugar or a scoop of vanilla ice cream. A delightful balance of sweet and tangy flavors with a crisp texture.
health_benefits: Apples provide fiber and vitamins; moderate sugar content. Best enjoyed as an occasional treat.

name: KitKat Frappe
description: A creamy, indulgent blended drink made with crushed KitKat chocolates, espresso, milk, and ice, topped with whipped cream and extra KitKat pieces. Perfect for chocolate lovers seeking a chilled, caffeinated treat.
health_benefits: Quick energy boost from caffeine and sugar. Best enjoyed in moderation.

name: Brownie
description: A rich, fudgy chocolate brownie with a crackly top and soft center, loaded with chocolate chunks. Served warm with a dusting of powdered sugar or a scoop of vanilla ice cream for an indulgent dessert experience.
health_benefits: Contains antioxidants from cocoa; provides quick energy boost (enjoy in moderation).

name: Oreo Frappe
description: A creamy, indulgent blended drink made with Oreo cookies, milk, ice, and a hint of coffee, topped with whipped cream and extra Oreo crumbs. A perfect chilled treat for cookie lovers.
health_benefits: Provides quick energy boost (enjoy in moderation).

name: Nutella Frappe
description: A rich and velvety blended drink made with creamy Nutella, milk, ice, and a shot of espresso, topped with whipped cream, chocolate drizzle, and hazelnut sprinkles. A heavenly chocolate-hazelnut indulgence for sweet cravings.
health_benefits: Provides quick energy boost (contains antioxidants from cocoa; enjoy in moderation).

name: Strawberry White Chocolate Frappe
description: A dreamy pink-hued blended drink combining fresh strawberry puree, creamy white chocolate, milk and ice, topped with whipped cream and strawberry slices. A perfect balance of fruity freshness and rich sweetness.
health_benefits: Contains antioxidants from strawberries; calcium from dairy (enjoy in moderation).

name: Biscoff Frappe
description: A luxurious caramelized cookie-flavored blended drink made with Biscoff cookie spread, milk, ice, and a hint of cinnamon, topped with whipped cream, Biscoff cookie crumbs, and a drizzle of caramel. A warm-spiced, creamy delight that tastes like liquid speculoos cookies.
health_benefits: Contains antioxidants from cinnamon (enjoy in moderation due to sugar content).

name: Strawberry Milkshake
description: A classic creamy milkshake made with fresh strawberries, vanilla ice cream, and milk, blended to perfection and topped with whipped cream and fresh strawberry slices. A refreshing, fruity treat that's both nostalgic and indulgent.
health_benefits: Rich in vitamin C from fresh strawberries; provides calcium from dairy.

name: Chocolate Milkshake
description: A rich, velvety milkshake made with premium cocoa or melted chocolate, vanilla ice cream, and milk, blended to perfection. Topped with whipped cream, chocolate shavings, and a drizzle of chocolate syrup for an extra indulgent treat. A timeless classic that satisfies all chocolate cravings.
health_benefits: Contains antioxidants from cocoa; provides calcium from dairy.

name: Banana Milkshake
description: A creamy, naturally sweet milkshake made with ripe bananas, vanilla ice cream, and milk, blended to smooth perfection. Topped with whipped cream and a sprinkle of cinnamon or chocolate powder. A healthy yet indulgent drink that tastes like liquid banana cream pie.
health_benefits: High in potassium and vitamin B6; provides natural energy boost.

name: KitKat Milkshake
description: A creamy, indulgent milkshake blended with crushed KitKat bars, vanilla ice cream, and milk, topped with whipped cream, chocolate drizzle, and extra KitKat pieces. A chocolate lover's dream with crispy wafer bits in every sip.

name: Vanilla Milkshake
description: A classic, creamy milkshake made with rich vanilla ice cream and chilled milk, blended to silky perfection. Topped with whipped cream and a sprinkle of vanilla bean powder for an elegant touch. The pure, comforting taste of vanilla in its simplest yet most satisfying form.
health_benefits: Provides calcium from dairy; lower sugar option available.

name: Oreo Milkshake
description: A creamy, cookie-packed milkshake blended with Oreo biscuits, vanilla ice cream, and milk, topped with whipped cream, extra Oreo crumbs, and a chocolate drizzle. A nostalgic treat with crunchy cookie bits in every sip.

name: Nutella Milkshake
description: A luxuriously smooth milkshake blended with Nutella, chocolate ice cream, and milk, topped with whipped cream, hazelnut sprinkles, and a warm Nutella drizzle. A rich, velvety homage to the beloved chocolate-hazelnut spread.
health_benefits: Contains antioxidants from cocoa (enjoy in moderation).

name: Apple Juice
description: A refreshing and naturally sweet juice made from freshly squeezed apples, served chilled. A crisp and healthy beverage packed with vitamins.
health_benefits: Rich in vitamin C and antioxidants, aids digestion.

name: Pineapple Juice
description: A tropical, tangy-sweet juice made from ripe pineapples, served chilled. Bursting with natural flavors and a hint of acidity.
health_benefits: High in vitamin C, bromelain (aids digestion), and manganese.

name: Watermelon Juice
description: A hydrating and subtly sweet juice made from fresh watermelon, served chilled. Light and perfect for hot days.
health_benefits: Hydrating, rich in lycopene (antioxidant), and low in calories.

name: Carrot Juice
description: A vibrant, earthy-sweet juice made from fresh carrots, served chilled. Nutrient-dense and naturally energizing.
health_benefits: High in beta-carotene (vitamin A), antioxidants, and supports eye health.

name: ABC Juice
description: A powerhouse detox juice made with fresh apples, beetroot, and carrots. This vibrant blend is naturally sweet, earthy, and packed with nutrients. Served chilled for a refreshing health boost.
health_benefits: Rich in antioxidants (beetroot), vitamin A (carrots), and fiber (apples). Supports immunity, digestion, and blood circulation.

name: Pineapple Pastry
description: A delightful layered pastry with light sponge cake, creamy pineapple custard filling, and a fluffy whipped cream topping. Garnished with juicy pineapple chunks and a cherry for a tropical touch.
health_benefits: Contains vitamin C from pineapple (enjoy in moderation).

name: Café Latte
description: A smooth espresso-based drink with steamed milk and a light layer of foam. Creamy and mildly caffeinated.
health_benefits: Calcium from milk; antioxidants from coffee.

name: Café Mocha
description: A decadent blend of espresso, steamed milk, chocolate syrup, and whipped cream. A dessert-like coffee.

name: Butter Scotch Pastry
description: Layers of golden sponge cake filled with creamy butterscotch custard, topped with caramel drizzle and crunchy toffee bits.

name: Black Forest Pastry
description: Classic German-inspired layers of chocolate sponge soaked in cherry syrup, filled with whipped cream and cherries, topped with chocolate shavings.

name: Chocolate Pastry
description: Decadent chocolate pastry with layers of moist chocolate sponge, rich chocolate cream, and a glossy chocolate glaze.

name: Death by Chocolate Pastry
description: Ultimate chocolate indulgence with layers of chocolate mousse, chocolate ganache, and chocolate sponge, finished with cocoa powder.

name: Rasmalai Pastry (Eggless)
description: Innovative fusion combining traditional rasmalai with pastry - eggless sponge soaked in reduced milk, layered with cream and pistachios.

name: Belgium Chocolate Pastry
description: Rich Belgian chocolate pastry with layers of dark chocolate sponge, silky chocolate ganache, and a hint of cocoa.

name: Hazelnut Pastry
description: Crunchy hazelnut-infused pastry with layers of nutty sponge, praline cream, and roasted hazelnut toppings.

description: Light and tropical eggless pastry with pineapple-infused sponge, whipped cream, and pineapple chunks.

name: Butter Scotch Pastry (Eggless)
description: Creamy butterscotch-flavored pastry with layers of eggless sponge, butterscotch cream, and caramelized sugar crunch.

name: Black Forest Pastry (Eggless)
description: Classic eggless Black Forest pastry with layers of chocolate sponge, whipped cream, and cherry compote.

name: Almond Burfi Pastry (Eggless)

name: Extra Malai Parcel
description: A sealed packet of whipped malai, sweetened and flavored with cardamom, perfect for customizing desserts.

name: Russian Salad Sandwich
